title: Look up at the Skytree, next to Asakusa Temple, Japanese style experience Edo style. Asakusa Station Pick-up & Drop-off (Room 101)

In the evening, the Japanese tatami mats can be pulled out and immediately become a comfortable mattress to help you sleep well at night. The air conditioner can be adjusted to your temperature in any season.We have a professional operations team with 10 years of management experience. We believe that our house will definitely provide you with a better trip!The spaceNewly renovated room with a happy home feel. We create a warm and comfortable accommodation for you to add peace of mind to your journey!The room is completely ready for you to move in with your suitcase. All facilities and supplies are ready for you. There are high-quality toiletries, free Wi-Fi, and you can take photos and go online, etc. Soft towels, disposable toothbrushes, and pure cotton bedding are provided in the room. It is clean and hygienic. Feel free to use them.There is a special service desk with full-time service staff to make your trip as convenient as possible.
